ca.utoronto.utm.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.utoronto.utm.shapes.Subject
      • ca.utoronto.utm.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, GString, Rectangle, Square

    public abstract class Shape
extends Subject
    A Shape is a Subject (so can be observed) it has a position and a color (all of which can be modified).
